Mendokusai

Tartarus

Alcohol III

20 Jan 2018

Last night and this morning were the happiest I have been so far this year, all thanks to alcohol. It seems like everything that makes me happy (less unhappy?) at the moment is unsustainable, which is frustrating. I should just try to enjoy those things in the moment thought I think.
